mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_USER(USERNAME, USERID, USERPW, USERINDATE) VALUES (#{username}, #{userid}, #{userpw}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ACCOUNT_USER ORDER BY USERIDX
SELECT USERIDX, TO_CHAR(USERNAME) AS USERNAME, USERID, TO_CHAR(USERPW) AS USERPW, TO_CHAR(USERINDATE) AS USERINDATE, TO_CHAR(USERUPDATE) AS USERUPDATE FROM ACCOUNT_USER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ACCOUNT_USER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_USER SET USERNAME = #{username}, USERPW = #{userpw}, USERUPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
